snippet: The Russian benchmark index gained 5 percent on Tuesday after a 10.8 percent decline the day before, and stock markets elsewhere made up lost ground.
abstract: Global markets calm on hopes of cooling tensions between Russia and Ukraine, helping stocks recover some of their losses from a sell-off earlier in the week.
lead_paragraph: The Russian benchmark index gained 5 percent on Tuesday after a 10.8 percent decline the day before, and stock markets elsewhere made up lost ground.

headline.main: Markets Rebound on Hopes of Tension Easing in Ukraine
headline.print_headline: Market Shrugs Off Worries About Standoff in Ukraine
